name: tagged (MP3::Tag)
short_description:
tagged consists of MP3::Tag and tk-tag. 
MP3::Tag is a Perl module for reading and writing MP3-Tags (ID3v1/1.1 and ID3v2.3). 

This sourceforge project isn't continued anymore but see  http://search.cpan.org/perldoc?MP3%3A%3ATag where you can find the most current version.
summary: Perl module for reading and writing MP3-Tags
